short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with ChatGPT, use it to improve your vocabulary, or prepare for an interview or just have fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ChatGPT Companion, your virtual conversation companion right in your browser! Whether you're gearing up for an interview, aiming to enhance your vocabulary, or simply seeking a friendly chat, this extension is your go-to tool.

Key Features:

Talk Anytime, Anywhere: Start natural language conversations without leaving your current tab. Seek information, assistance, or just enjoy a friendly chat seamlessly.

Productivity Boost: Draft emails, brainstorm ideas, or gather quick informationâ€”all within your browser for enhanced productivity.

Customizable Settings: Tailor your experience. Adjust conversation styles, themes, and language settings to make it truly yours.

Secure and Private: Benefit from ChatGPT while prioritizing your privacy. Your interactions are secure, ensuring the safety of your sensitive information.

Seamless Integration: Whether you're a developer, student, or professional, ChatGPT Companion effortlessly integrates into your daily workflow, proving to be an invaluable tool for various tasks.
